datasets.resource_id: specific computing infrastructure for this training
datasets.extract_response_id: response id from data service (file data_response_v0.1.json)

model_conf.storage_ref_id: id of code that manages in storage service
model_conf.module_name: code for training at edges, must be attached

pre_train_model.url: link to get pre-train model from storage service
pre_train_model.name: name of model on model management module/service
